document.full_text: boise state university could lose hundreds of thousands of dollars in revenue from lost sporting and entertainment events if idaho lawmakers approve a bill to allow guns on college campuses, a college official said.
document.title: sports briefing | colleges: boise st. official warns about costs of gun bill
lines_and_colors: boise state university could lose hundreds of thousands of dollars in revenue from lost sporting and entertainment events if idaho lawmakers approve a bill to allow guns on college campuses, a college official said.
